QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: videoSource
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Source for video. UDP, TCP, RTSP and UVC Cameras may be supported depending on Vehicle and ground station version.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: udpPort
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: UDP port to bind to for video stream.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtspUrl
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: RTSP url address and port to bind to for video stream. Example: rtsp://192.168.42.1:554/live

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: tcpUrl
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: TCP url address and port to bind to for video stream. Example: 192.168.143.200:3001

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: aspectRatio
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Video Aspect Ratio (width / height). Use 0.0 to ignore it.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: gridLines
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Displays a grid overlaid over the video view.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: showRecControl
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Show recording control in the UI.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: maxVideoSize
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Maximum amount of disk space used by video recording.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: enableStorageLimit
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: When enabled, old video files will be auto-deleted when the total size of QGC-recorded video exceeds the maximum video storage usage.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: rtspTimeout
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: How long to wait before assuming RTSP link is gone.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: lowLatencyMode
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: If this option is enabled, the rtpjitterbuffer is removed and the video sink is set to assynchronous mode, reducing the latency by about 200 ms.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: forceVideoDecoder
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Force specific category of video decode
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Force the change of prioritization between video decode methods, allowing the user to force some video hardware decode plugins if necessary.
QGC.MetaData.Facts.enumStrings: Default,Force software decoder,Force NVIDIA decoder,Force VA-API decoder,Force DirectX3D 11 decoder,Force VideoToolbox decoder
